explains: adj. 合作的，协作的；乐于配合的；（企业或其他组织）合作性的
wordGroup: cooperative learning 合作学习，共同学习
rural cooperative medical service 农村合作医疗
cooperative communication 合作交流；[计]协同通信
cooperative bank n. 合作银行；储蓄贷款协会
cooperative association 合作协会，合作社
cooperative advertising n. 工商业联合广告

sentences.en: The factory is now a workers' cooperative.
sentences.cn: 这家工厂现为工人合作企业。

sentences.en: They decided a housing cooperative was the way to regenerate the area.
sentences.cn: 他们决定用合作建房的方式重建这一地区。

sentences.en: She had been charged with being an accessory to the embezzlement of funds from a cooperative farm.
sentences.cn: 她已被指控为挪用一个合作农场资金的一个从犯。
